snippet.title: FUR Squadron Phoenix | Robin Story Trailer
snippet.description:
"War drums are beating in the Bist System. Alarmed by the increasing activity of the dangerous Marauders, the Chimera Federation has decided to reinforce the troops of its space fleet. A brave and determined recruit is sent to the renegade FUR Squadron for special training using their virtual reality technology. Will they manage to hone their skills before it's too late?"

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM and don't miss its upcoming release!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2674650/FUR_Squadron_Phoenix

A new chapter of the FUR Squadron saga. Discover the events that precede the original space action game in this next release.

-------
